attributes.action: England Not to adopt the new 20mph Road speed  limits in the future
attributes.additional_details:
The government must rule out in following Wales in there disastrous new 20 mph speed limit changes . 
We're there are schools, hospitals  we back 20mph.
 But to blanket ban 30mph just for the sake of it we don't back.
20 mph driving increases air pollution when car drive in a low gear and cause congestion with also creates more pollution.
attributes.background: Not to consider in changing the majority of 30mph roads in England to 20mph like in Wales.

rejection.details:
The Government has announced that it will be review guidance on 20mph speed limits in England. 
Further information is available here:
https://www.gov.uk/government/news/government-announces-new-long-term-plan-to-back-drivers
